regionName:
big region name, related to configuration_of_regions.csv and field sourceRegionName into configuration_of_subdivisions.csv. Beware, may be different from subdivision name.
WesternUS: 0, USAlaska: 1. EURAlps: 3, ASHimalaya: 2, AMAndes: 4
writeGeotiffs:
1: a geotiff is generated for the variable in Step3 (regions.runWriteGeotiffs()). 0: no geotiff generated.
NB: viewable_snow_fraction should be set to 1 if there’s another variable available for the sensor/algorithm because it is used as a filter, even if not displayed on the website
writeStats: 1: the variable is integrated in statistic calculation. 0: the variable is not integrated. NB: if you edit this, don’t forget to edit configuration_of_filepaths.csv and adding rows corresponding to variables
isDefault: indicated which variable is displayed by default in the website (implies the default selected sensor and the default selected varname)
output_name: variable name, used only for information.
